newsitem.title: USA: BayBank wins $22 mln West Springfield, Mass., BANs.
newsitem.headline: BayBank wins $22 mln West Springfield, Mass., BANs.

text.p: BayBank said it won $22.4 million of West Springfield, Mass., bond anticipation notes (BANS).
The net interest cost (NIC) was 3.612 percent and a coupon of 3.75 percent.
